attributes.action: Allow the Police immunity from prosecution when dealing with violent disorder.
attributes.additional_details:
Allow the Police to deal with violent disorder with all means necessary without fear of legal repercussions.

20:20 Hindsight is a wonderful thing, yet the Police have to make snap decisions based on intelligence gathered on the scene.

We cannot allow our Police remain impotent in the eyes of people who flaunt the law.

If you do not comply with instructions from the Police in these situations then you forfeit your civil rights.
